website_summaries.verdict: Tracks all kinds of data as you take practice swings to determine whether you're making proper swings.
pros: Offers 14 sensors to take measurements without the need to be hitting balls on the course
Measures speed and path of your club to create a simulated ball distance and accuracy measurement
After studying the data the sensor provides, you can make adjustments to your swing to correct the measured problems
cons: Depending on your swing type, software may need a lot of tweaking for accuracy

customer_reviews.title: clips are CHEAP!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product thinking it would be a fun, and a little bit cheaper, alternative to playing the actual course. WRONG!!! At $100 for 13 clips i might as well make the money worth it and play 3 rounds of golf with how easily they break. The little clips that are suppose to hold the sensor on the club shaft are cheap and break easily. I could make stronger clips from paper. I played 9 of 18 holes my first time to try it out and 4 of the 14 clips broke and half my strokes were putts. I wont be able to finish 2 rounds at this rate and will definitely never recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Got this for Christmas and it is pretty fun. The putting is nonsense but most every ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for Christmas and it is pretty fun. The putting is nonsense but most every simulater available has terrible putting. Only complaint I have is that in order to use the simulater you better have a pretty powerful laptop or desktop in terms of graphics card and memory as my laptop was not powerful enough to run the game. So that extra money I could’ve used to buy the skytrak went into a computer. Other than that it works great and is a lot of fun. The yardage is preset for clubs but that can be changed in the options for your clubs. Set lofts and lengths of clubs to improve the accuracy of yardage and strikes.
customer_reviews.author: Trent D.

customer_reviews.title: Good swing feedback and a lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool to understand variances from swing to swing to help test out adjustments. Things like club head speed, launch angle, swing path, club face open/close, etc. are very valuable to understanding how different variables result in different outcomes. It's easy enough to get started, but may take some tweaking to get it looking just right on your monitor. Overall it is a very fun way to practice and I'm very much enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: This device is amazing. Others have complained about the clips breaking but I haven't had that problem. Mine has worked great, very accurate and with a little adjustment to the clubs distance is accurate. I gave Tech support a one because the promise of upgrading to The Golf Club 2019 software hasn't happened. It's been over a year and they won't even give a status anymore. The original The Golf Club software is ok the graphics are great but TGC 2019 has a lot more features. For the price this sim is hard beat and is far beyond Optishot which I also own.
customer_reviews.author: ned

customer_reviews.title: I wish it worked as advertised but it does not.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to work but the accuracy is way off on the device I recurved. See video for what I mean. It’s off as much as 100%. I hit my driver 250-275 when struck well and this shows it 116-145 yards. I hit my 7 iron farther than that. Also the description says the course software works on OS11+ but I cannot find the course software for anything other than PC and android. Only the driving range works on apple devices.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE - 4 MONTHS OLD NO LONGER WORKS - Clips very cheap
customer_reviews.text: 1.2ea. of the clips broke within 1st week of utilization. I am certain the other clips will not last very long, but I have my fingers crossed. The threads on the clips are very misaligned & very difficult to install. 2. I think the distance is somewhat liberal, in other words it states you hit the ball further than you really do. 3. The feedback on direction is great & a very good benefit, it really assisted with my eliminating my hook 4. Overall it has assisted my game. 5. It was beneficial when it worked. 6. 4 months old and has completely stop working!
customer_reviews.author: slh

customer_reviews.title: Good system, fragil clips
customer_reviews.text: I like the system as it gave fairly good ball tracking and club path analysis. The graphics are very good on the golf courses and the driving range and it was fun to practice with, unfortunately three clips broke within 20 minutes of using. I would give this a solid 4 stars if not for the clips breaking so easily therefore unless you want to keep re-ordering clips this is weak 2 star review. Fix the clip issue and perhaps I'd buy it again but for now back to Amazon we go!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy golf anytime
customer_reviews.text: The system is very easy to setup and get going you don't need a impact screen just a net for indoors and with your smart phone you can it out to the range with the R-motion app. just download it from the app store it is great just like a $500. launch monitor and you get the same feed back, and if you want to add a impact screen and projector later you can it makes the indoor part even better. The tech support is very helpful and with respond within a day to any questions that you may have. Overall a very nice system for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Monville

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality harware
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product, At my first swing, the clip broken and the sensor fall down to the floor. replace another one and try the second swing, the clip broken again and the sensor fly away with the ball. No more try, just return it.
customer_reviews.author: Derun G.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME AND MONEY... Go with Optishot 2
customer_reviews.text: My laptop exceeds all of the basic requirements and I cannot get R-Motion to consistently work properly. I have left 5 messages on their “Customer Support” line with absolutely NO response. Optishot is a bit finicky, but once you get the lighting right, Optishot blows R-Motion away and has a customer support line who actually answers the phone. VERY disappointed... Our 3 boys and I were so excited after reading positive reviews regarding what R-Motion claims their system can do, but could not get it to work longer than 15 minutes without the dongle miss-firing, the game crashing or the sensor disconnecting itself and/or powering off randomly. Just missed the return window, so I have completely wasted $350.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin White

customer_reviews.title: Great Company & Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The putting is a little wonky but you get what you pay for. I hit the ball about 225 - 250 yards with my driver and that's exactly what this is reading. I'm not sure it's all that accurate on the amount of draw or fade the ball has on it but again - for the money it's a great deal. I have dealt with a few issues where it doesn't pick up my swing but that's really my only gripe. I'm very happy with the product. I think that the company that has made this product is really on to something. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed using the R-Motion Golf Simulator. I am not a good enough golfer to even entertain the idea of getting a more advanced simulator or launch monitor, but I would say at the price point that R-Motion is absolutely worth the money. The clips are easy to put on and I have had no issues with the tracker synching with either my phone over Bluetooth or the USB dongle on the PC. The tracking of the clubs is about as accurate as I could have hoped for and I really think this will be a good purchase as both a training aid and a way to just have fun playing quick virtual rounds.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Lewnau

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: The Rapsodo golf simulator is awesome. I bought this primarily as an aid to help with my game and it works great. The instant feedback really helps to identify problems with your swing. I have used it to help me with distances for my irons and wedges and it has really helped my game
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time. This has exceeded my expectations. The set up is very easy and the The Golf Clubgame is a blast to play. I am a very high handicap golfer and this will definitely help me practice during the long winter months.
customer_reviews.author: dharris

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Will improve your golf swing and game.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great product and golf training aid. I have been able to see what my swing is doing and make changes and see what the changes do. Very accurate once you take the time to set up the club length correctly. I have already recommended it to my friends that play.
customer_reviews.author: aserna2

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is great. I was able to make some nice adjustments to my swing based on feedback from simulation. I use it most hitting into a net, so I get more feedback by using this simulator. All shots go a little more left than they are really going at the range, but now that I know that, I can judge my shot trajectory of a shot into the net based on that knowledge. Distance is inaccurate, but that was expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great golfing fun for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm having great fun hitting shots and analyzing my swing for improvement. Has data necessary for the average player to see where mistakes are being made in swing path, club face angle, as well as spin rates. The courses are fantastic fun when you can't play live. Cannot give 5 stars due to the amount of frustration in setting up and understanding how all components interact with one another. If there is an instruction manual or operations manual, I did not receive it. Had to Utube everything. Once solved, though, definitely has good value for the entertainment dollar.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mosman

customer_reviews.title: Great start for an indoor simulator.
customer_reviews.text: Love the system having a blast golfing in the winter highly recommend getting the full upgrade on courses. Mobile app sucks - my experience with it was very inaccurate while hitting on the range. Tried computer software I have had no issues with it. I’ve yet to use customer service but see they have no chat or phone call option just email I give it a 3.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley roof

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you tape your sensor down it will go flying
customer_reviews.text: So I was only able to use this for one outting. Took it out to the range and lost it. I guess this sensor gets loose and I didn’t see any mentioned about it. I hope it’s found. Second the app seems a little out dated with its picture quality. It gave me some good feedback. Definitely a problem when the brackets don’t hold the sensor is place. If I knew it wouldn’t stay on I would of taken more measures to secure it after each swing. There goes $300 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: wilfredo negron jr

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Great device and very accurate. The price was right The attachments make it easy to change the sensor from club to club while you play a round of golf Absolutely love the simulation and app Con: more sensors needed Didn't like moving that one sensor from club to club
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a waste of your time and money. I realize that you can't expect a $200 product to give you the same results as a $25,000 launch monitor, but you should still expect it to work. I have spent countless hours trying to connect to the website, and contacting "customer support". The information provided by the sensor, when it did work was worthless. Customer support is a joke, however it's not funny. If there was a rating less than one star, I would have chosen it. If you are serious about usable swing feedback save your money, buy a launch monitor.
customer_reviews.author: L. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: If you already own a high powered gaming PC, then R-Motion should be considered.
customer_reviews.text: I needed to buy a high powered gaming PC to run r-motion. For me it wasn't worth the extra cost so I returned everything. I ended up with an Opti-shot which runs nicely on a 4 year old, $300.00 Lenovo laptop. Very few gaming options for R-Motion compared with Opti-shot.
customer_reviews.author: Jeggolfer68

customer_reviews.title: REALLY BAD
customer_reviews.text: I use to have a Optishot and tried this new product R-Motion, since the beggining the distances not correct, it read the first 4 or 5 holes but then very difficult to connect and read shots.....finally last week on shots normally of driver, the reading failed and read only 10 yards....tried everything, reboot, reinstalled.....I gave up....I return to the optishot system and wait for a better and more accesible product
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Javier Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: AVOID THIS SIMULATOR
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough how disappointed I am in this unit. 1) I couldn't get any legitimate help with customer service at all. Your only point of contact is emails. Unacceptable 2) The system would not register swings with my computer no matter what I did 3) The Apple app wouldn't register swings either 4) The Android app doesn't work at all, will not link to the sensor Buy the Optishot and forget about this junk. The Optishot is what you are looking for, you will NOT be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KURT GAGNE

customer_reviews.title: If you can't afford a SkyTrak - get this!
customer_reviews.text: It only measures club angle, so it can't measure how you actually hit the ball. That literally is the only downside. Otherwise, it's a great product. Fantastic value for money and for $US250 you can have feedback on club face and path allowing you to see where you're going wrong in your swing. Obviously, if you have the $2k for SkyTrak you should get that for perfect readings, but if you want to just get into your backyard and have more than just a net in front of you - this is the perfect product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: App and software download don't work
customer_reviews.text: Unable to download a usable file to install the gaming software, and the app is horrible - locks up and requires constant log in. I've already submitted my return - very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Affordable fun and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get my R-Motion but when I received it the sensor work not connect to my laptop. Customer service worked with me on a number of occasions to try and resolve the issue. When we couldn’t get it to work they simply sent me out two new sensors (as well as three free attachments!) to see if those would work. Sure enough one did and I couldn’t be happier. This is a fun and affordable way to swing your clubs in the winter. Thank you for your help and service Rapsodo!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian P Hurt

customer_reviews.title: R-Motion is a great device, I was hitting a lot of left ...
customer_reviews.text: R-Motion is a great device, I was hitting a lot of left shots and thought the device was bad, although it was correct. I took it to the range and it was pretty accurate, it is best to input club length and loft to get correct distance. The unit reads just about everything but bladed or high on the club face. Great customer service, graphics and price. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate - no point
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, not at all accurate. I tried it in the range as well as on the course..
customer_reviews.author: Kalyan Jonnalagadda

customer_reviews.title: Great for a stormy day
customer_reviews.text: Like the game and analysis, results were same as a more expensive program analyzer I have. Didn't like the way the adapter was secured to the club, only one side connects and it kinda hangs.
customer_reviews.author: David Garlinghouse

customer_reviews.title: cannot install
customer_reviews.text: I thought this game has a good idea but unfortunately, I cannot install the app. The app is frozen and no response I return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Tak

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: So far this has worked pretty good. I knew it wasn’t going to be a track man or anything but it gets the job done for my garage sim.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Immediate reduction in score
customer_reviews.text: An absolute must have for the serious golfer. Easy set up in your garage or backyard. Using your own clubs easily analyze and adjust your swing. Check out you club speed, ball speed, club angle, all with you very own clubs with immediate feedback. The most affordable tracker on the market
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Jones

customer_reviews.title: Better than other simulators in the price range.
customer_reviews.text: I have an optishot 2 and can tell you that this is so much easier to use. The distances are almost dead on with my real golf game. Unlike the optishot, this isn't affectd by light and shadows. You can use it indoors, or out. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: JUSTIN WORKMAN

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It’s truly not worth $200. The computer program needs a lot of updating. There is no practice range option that will give you an average of your shots. If you are using thing for real practice at home then you are better off saving for a different product.
customer_reviews.author: k miller

customer_reviews.title: Cbep crap
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst system ever. It's not even close to accurate, then, the clip flies off the club, even when it's on so tight I can't move it. As soon as I hit it on a swing with a 6 iron, the chip fell off. I don't know how, but it flew off and has disappeared. So now I'm out almost $300 because this is so cheap. Beware of garbage
customer_reviews.author: Adam2811

customer_reviews.title: I have not been able to get them to work
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing that resembles instructions. You have to call in, wait in line and hope you got someone who knows the product. Driver went about 80 yards. Never knew what was going to happen next.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: This simulator is excellent for the price. I am yet to adjust the distances of my clubs, but I have read that if I do, the game will become more accurate. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mohamad Hussein

customer_reviews.title: Great Simulator for the Price
customer_reviews.text: It took some tweaking to get the clips in the right position but after I did, the accuracy was really surprising. Definitely glad I purchased the package that included the extra clips. Great add with making the RMotion app available on Android!
customer_reviews.author: ssea1

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price. Takes a bit to set up each club sensor location for accurate reporting and the game could use some sort of directions, but you can figure it out after awhile. Don't really know if the yardage is accurate yet, but I use it to develop consistently and it works great for that! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Gitmo

customer_reviews.title: Good game!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it but the putting. Can’t get it to register so put it on auto putt. Good game though.
customer_reviews.author: James Perillo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Brilliant both the app and software helps me practice before a round , and it's fun to play a virtual round too
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: You've got to try it to believe it.
customer_reviews.text: I am able to practice in the comfort of my rec room. It allows me to quickly identify and correct my swing faults. I normally shoot in low 90s on my home course, had rmotion less than a month and now every round including a round at a course I had never played before, I have shaved 6-8 strokes on each round.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold Dones

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Reviewed under model without extra clips. Fun for a game, perhaps, accuracy poor, not useful for game improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great (and fun) tool!
customer_reviews.text: R-Motion is lots of fun and has really helped me work on different shot shapes and has improved consistency in my swing.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Polly

customer_reviews.title: Rapsodo R-Motion Golf Simulator
customer_reviews.text: There is an Android app for the simulator but it doesn't work on my Samsung Galaxy S9+. It doesn't see the bluetooth dongle and support does not respond to emails. I have a $200 piece of junk. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: gman

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: This unit has definitely helped my short game. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Koehnen

customer_reviews.title: Easily worth the money
customer_reviews.text: So far iv hit 6 iron down and putted, great golf simulation software and the R-Motion reacts well to different shot types and swing speeds. Only issue so far is that it doesn’t always register shorter chip shots. But for the money I am very impressed so far
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Excellant product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Used it this weekend and had a blast playing several courses in a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Larry M

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Got this one Monday and having a blast with it. A must for every golfer
customer_reviews.author: Terran Guest Laura

customer_reviews.title: Its a scam
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. Charged it for 5 hours and it still did not work. My phone never detected it. The app kept crashing. I spent $300 and got trash. Stay away from this crap.
customer_reviews.author: Rajat Prakash

customer_reviews.title: Tracker doesn't work with PC software
customer_reviews.text: The tracker doesn’t link correctly to the PC software. It won’t read his swing even though the light is green and it says it’s connected. The Phone app works fine but there is limited functionality on the app.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game!
customer_reviews.text: Shipment was fast! Had a lol glitch with the dongle and my computer but customer service was great on resolving my problem quickly. Awesome game!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: off to the right all the time
customer_reviews.text: always registers to the right... even when im on the range and i hit it stright
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well and have had much fun with the simulator.
customer_reviews.author: MBless

customer_reviews.title: Pretty accurate and fun to use!
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed using this product. I find it to be pretty accurate. It was super easy to setup and get going. I have young sons and they also have had a chance to use it with me. It has really been a blast. It is great to be able to golf year round.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Weiland

customer_reviews.title: Great simulator
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Need to increase the clubs length in settings to get accurate yardage, but overall very pleased with simulator and TGC game on computer.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Kleinwolterink

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t get it to sync up appropriately. Tech support is almost non existent from Rapsodo. Very disappointed and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product/ investment
customer_reviews.text: The clip flew off my club. Got into golf due to the gyms being were closed for COVID 19. Saddest day looked for it for hours. Fyi make sure the sensor is tight to the club. Do not end up in my position😞
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Amponsa

customer_reviews.title: Great program, great game at really cheaper costs!!!
customer_reviews.text: Some problems for the set up. But I sent an email to customer centre and they explained me exactly the set up. Just only one thing. OK 14 clips - but just only one sensor??!!! WOWWW. I hope it doesn't break quickly!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MSERGIO SERGIO

customer_reviews.title: Chip won’t charge
customer_reviews.text: The chip will not charge. Can we get another one. We enjoy the product, but useless without the chip.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Atherton

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work on any of my computers, tablet, or phone. Tech support didn't help at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid F

customer_reviews.title: Probably wouldn’t get one again
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to set up. Haven’t used it yet because it’s that hard to get set up.
customer_reviews.author: greg mcclanahan

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Unit is inaccurate and hard to connect to most of the time. Wish i would have gotten a small tracker
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work... Just returned it and invested my money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Martin

customer_reviews.title: Do not work at all,no support
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for two weeks and it has not made one swing.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Did not record or track data or swing speed well at all
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Pretty accurate most of the time!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: but the amount of time I have wasted messing around with thing and still to very little ...
customer_reviews.text: It works so inconsistently. I have not gotten through a round without having to restart it. Half the time I want to play either the game interface will not start up or the sensor will not start up. Then I get it to work and then it stops working in the middle of a round. I would have returned the item, but my wife got hospitalized for 2 weeks and while in the hospital my return window closed. Now I'm stuck with the device that only frustrates me. Money is one thing, but the amount of time I have wasted messing around with thing and still to very little avail. Save your money until they improve this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Riley

customer_reviews.title: Great product horrible customer service I can’t get it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product horrible customer service I can’t get it to connect right and sent several emails nobody is call me back
customer_reviews.author: bryan duelley

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME !!!!!! Review from a  7Handicaper
customer_reviews.text: # 1 Customer Service is Outstanding! What I Liked Is Very Close to True Yardages and Ball Flight ! Have taken With Me to TOP GOLF and Yardage Readings Are so Close to Each other ! I love that it Track's Club Approach Path ! If you want the most Bang for your Buck ! R/Motion is your Ticket !PS Have owned Since Jan 2018 With No Problems ! Thx R Motion
customer_reviews.author: carl drew

customer_reviews.title: Get to golf in the winter
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Makes hitting at a net more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Rasmussen

product_meta.title: Rapsodo R-Motion Golf Simulator and Swing Analyzer with 14 Clip Attachments - PC and Smartphone
feature_bullets: R-Motion Golf Simulator: includes Tracker, 14 Clips and 15 top courses to choose from plus a Driving Range mode
Accurate Club and Ball Data to improve your game. Multi-Player Mode to challenge your friends
Runs on your PC or Smartphone - No launch monitor or projector required. Note : Refer to the PDF attached below in Technical Specification for User Manual
PC Requirements Windows 7 (32bit or 64bit) Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 670 or better DirectX: Minimum version 11 or better.
Recommended Specs: OS: Windows 10 (64Bit), Processor: Intel Core i7, Memory: 8 GB RAM, Graphics: NVidia GTX 970 (or better GTX1060, GTX1070 or GTX1080), DirectX: Version 11.
Network: Broadband Internet connection, Hard Drive: 20 GB available space, Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible.
For the Mobile application: iOS 9.0 and above Android 6.0 Marshmallow and above

Note: Kindly refer user manual before use. What's included: 1 R-Motion base package with 1 sensor, 1 charging cord, 1 USB dongle, and one club attachment clip. Also includes an additional box with 13 extra club attachment clips

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
